title: Tibialis Raises (against wall)
instructions: Stand with your back against a wall, feet slightly forward.
Keep heels down and lift toes toward your shins.
Lower slowly with control.
cautions: Stop if sharp pain in the shin.

title: Calf Raises
instructions: Stand tall holding support if needed.
Rise onto toes, pause briefly, lower slowly.
cautions: Use controlled tempo; stop if sharp pain.

title: Leg Swings
instructions: Hold support and stand tall.
Swing one leg forward and back in a comfortable range.
Repeat on both sides.
cautions: Do not force range of motion.

title: Split Squat Isometric Hold
instructions: Step into a split stance.
Lower into a shallow split squat and hold.
Keep front knee tracking over toes comfortably.

title: Glute Bridge
instructions: Lie on your back with knees bent.
Squeeze glutes and lift hips.
Pause and lower slowly.

title: Wall Calf Stretch
instructions: Hands on wall, one foot back.
Keep back heel down and knee straight.
Lean forward until gentle calf/Achilles stretch.
cautions: Do not bounce. Stop if sharp pain.

title: Bent-Knee Calf Stretch (Soleus Bias)
instructions: Hands on wall with one foot back.
Bend the back knee slightly while keeping heel down.
Feel stretch lower in calf/Achilles region.

title: Eccentric Heel Drop
instructions: Stand on a step on the balls of both feet.
Rise with both feet.
Lower slowly on the affected side.
cautions: Mild discomfort may be okay; stop for sharp pain.

title: Ankle Rocks (knee-to-wall)
instructions: Face a wall with one foot forward.
Drive knee toward wall while keeping heel down.
Move in and out of a gentle range.
cautions: Keep heel planted; avoid forcing range.

title: Ankle Circles
instructions: Lift one foot slightly off the ground.
Make slow circles at the ankle in both directions.

title: Calf Raise Isometric Hold
instructions: Rise onto the balls of your feet.
Hold near the top with steady balance.
Lower slowly.
cautions: Use support if balance is limited.

title: Foot Roll (ball massage)
instructions: Place a ball under the foot arch.
Roll gently from heel to forefoot.
cautions: Avoid aggressive pressure if very irritable.

title: Toe Yoga
instructions: Stand barefoot or sit tall.
Lift big toe while others stay down, then switch.
Move slowly and focus on control.

title: Glute Bridge
instructions: Lie on your back with knees bent.
Lift hips by squeezing glutes.
Pause, then lower slowly.

title: Lateral Band Walk
instructions: Place a light band around ankles or above knees.
Slightly bend knees and step sideways with control.
Keep toes forward and hips level.

title: Dynamic Hamstring Sweep
instructions: Step one heel forward with toes up.
Sweep hands toward the foot as hips hinge slightly.
Return and switch sides.

title: Cat-Cow
instructions: Start on hands and knees.
Alternate gentle arching and rounding of the spine.
Move slowly with breathing.
